title: Kylie Jenner showers Stormi with kisses... after admitting she's on 'great terms' with Travis Scott
text:
She's focusing on her baby girl amid a difficult time.

And Kylie Jenner showered little Stormi with kisses during a filtered video shared to Instagram on Thursday morning.

The 22-year-old beauty mogul cuddled up to her little one after sharing on Twitter that she's on 'great terms' with ex-beau Travis Scott following a sudden split.

Family: Kylie Jenner showered little Stormi with kisses during a filtered video shared to Instagram on Thursday morning

Kylie appeared to be relatively makeup-free for the early morning video with her one-year-old daughter and a blonde gal pal.

Her long brunette hair brushed up against her face as she planted kisses on her little one's face, with hot pink dollar signs flushing the screen.

'I love you ... do you love me?' she asked before Stormi quickly responded 'yes.'

The cosmetics queen was showing some love on social media as she posed in a crisp white Adidas outfit for her 147million followers.

Hugs: The 22-year-old beauty mogul cuddled up to her little one after sharing on Twitter that she's on 'great terms' with ex-beau Travis Scott following a sudden split

Bright: The cosmetics queen was showing some love on social media as she posed in a crisp white Adidas outfit for her 147million followers

Jenner sprawled across the backseat of a car while promoting the athletic brand in her monochrome ensemble.

She set the record straight earlier in the day that despite spending some time apart, she's committed to maintaining a healthy dialogue with her ex.

'Travis and i are on great terms and our main focus right now is Stormi,' she wrote. 'Our friendship and our daughter is priority.'

Kylie and Travis reportedly split several weeks ago after more than two years of dating.

Model behavior: Jenner sprawled across the backseat of a car while promoting the athletic brand in her monochrome ensemble

A mood: Hot pink dollar signs fluttered the screen in a series of shots on Instagram

The last time the couple were pictured together was at the August 27 premiere of the Netflix documentary, Travis Scott: Look Mom I Can Fly, which chronicles the rapper's personal and professional life.

She was spotted on Tuesday with pals Anastasia 'Stassi' Karanikolaou and Kelsey Calemine at West Hollywood hot spot Delilah from around midnight until shortly after 2 a.m. where she drove to a studio where her ex Tyga was also hanging out.

Fans speculated that Kylie and Tyga might now be back on again after the interesting rendezvous.

'The internet makes everything 100 times more dramatic than what it really is,' she added on Twitter. 'There was no “2am date with Tyga”. You see me drop two of my friends off at a studio that he happened to be at.'
description: The 22-year-old beauty mogul cuddled up to her little one after sharing on Twitter that she's on 'great terms' with ex-beau Travis Scott following a sudden split.
